nodes.text: Insider Interview: Lama Su, with the subtitle "A Candid Conversation with the Head Cloner about Genetic Mutations, Dick Clark, and Learning to Love Yourself" is a non-canon article published in Star Wars Insider 67. It presents a humourous fictional interview between writer/director Kevin Rubio and Kaminoan Prime Minister Lama Su. The article references real-life figures such as Mahatama Gandhi and ideological concepts such as communism.

Following the provision of a clone army to the Galactic Republic, Insider sends Kevin Rubio to Tipoca City on Kamino for an interview about cloning with Kaminoan Prime Minister Lama Su. They two discuss the technicalities of cloning and the ideal candidates. Rubio then meets and chats with a clone trooper, CT-282-SD00001-983725138, "282" for short, and at the conclusion is given a clone of himself, with whom he argues.
